name: AmbientVisualsSubwayTrain
0:
”Alexa, start Subway train”
”Alexa, open Subway train”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: subway train
des:
Train ride ambience with video on Echo Spot and Echo Show and audio on any regular Echo devices. Audio also loops infinitely + broad selection of many other audiovisual themes. 

Get impressive previews of all Ambient Visuals on www.ambivisuals.com and follow @RapidWildfire on Twitter or Facebook to get updates on new skills in our collection.

Optimized for Echo Show and Echo Spot, this skill does not only provide ambient sounds but enriches the experience with high-quality video of a train trip in a seamless loop.

It can help you fall asleep or gives a calming atmosphere to your home.
Impress your guests with fascinating screensaver on Echo Show and Echo Spot.

Currently, this skill plays back audio and/or video for two hours in a “perfect loop” (audio also in infinite loop). You can still use your Echo device while video and audio are playing as Alexa returns to the playback after setting a timer or asking for the time. Just what you would expect from a good screensaver.

Search for “Ambient Visuals” in the skill store and you’ll get even more skills of this kind.

We’re looking forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions on how to improve the experience even more.

-----------------------------------
Stock Media provided by nmid / Pond5
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
